item.name: üìß Email Service (Frontend don't call directly)

body.raw:
{
    "to": "employee@example.com",
    "employeeName": "Wei Zhang",
    "documentType": "I-20",
    "status": "Received",
    "nextStep": "Please upload your OPT STEM Receipt once you receive it."
}

{
    "to": "employee@example.com",
    "employeeName": "Wei Zhang",
    "documentType": "OPT STEM EAD",
    "status": "Approved",
    "nextStep": "Congratulations! Your OPT STEM application is complete."
}

item.description: Email Service endpoints for sending various notification emails. Includes both synchronous (immediate) and asynchronous (via RabbitMQ) options.
